algorithm_technique: Sliding window with frequency array to track distinct characters.
Sliding window with hashmap to track distinct characters and their counts.
problem_summary_simple: Find the longest substring with no more than k unique characters.
problem_summary_technical: Sliding window technique. Expand window, shrink when distinct characters exceed k, tracking max length.
key_insights: The sliding window expands to the right and shrinks from the left.
Maintain a count of distinct characters within the current window.
When the distinct count exceeds k, shrink the window from the left until the condition is met.
Using a hashmap (Counter) simplifies tracking character frequencies and distinct counts.
The `len(counter)` directly gives the number of distinct characters.
Efficiently remove characters from the counter when their count drops to zero.
